Sentence.sentence: It cannot respond to the opportunities which industry may offer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In  a  study  published  last  year,  psychologists  coined  the  term  workplace  telepressure  to  describe  an  employee's urge to immediately respond to emails and engage in obsessive thoughts about returning an email  to one's boss, colleagues or clients.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If employees respond quickly to their job assignments, the employer is likely to demand more from them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: How Virgin Galactic, regulators and the public respond to this most recent tragedy will deter mine whether and how soon private space travel can transcend that playground.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Our brains respond better to difficulty than we imagine
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ask the administration or the Republicans or most academics why America needs more manufacturing, and they respond that manufacturing gives birth to innovation, brings down the trade deficit, strengthens the dollar, generates jobs, arms the military and brings about a recovery from recession.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: How did the White House respond to Ford's announcement to bring some production
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: not everybody is willing or ready to respond
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One way of responding to your boss's suggestion is to explain the possible consequences to her and offer an alternative solution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The third type of feedback is disconfirmation, which occurs when others fail to respond to your notion of self by responding neutrally.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They readily respond to medical treatment
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He responds readily to the other party's proposals.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But the artistic part of negotiation I think has to do with responding immediately to cues one gets in the process of negotiation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Whenever they responded correctly, they were rewarded with fish.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Civilian aviation is being disrupted, not by the age-old desires for speed, romanticism and glamour, but by the pressing need to respond to a changing climate.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: How Virgin Galactic, regulators and the public respond to this most recent tragedy will determine whether and how soon private space travel can transcend that playground.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I think a lot of what people consider luck is attributed to how you respond to the opportunities that come your way.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In a study published last year, psychologists coined the term "workplace telepressure" to describe an employee's urge to immediately respond to emails and engage in obsessive thoughts about returning an email to one's boss, colleagues or clients.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Unemployment cannot be brought down rapidly, declared one 1935 analysis, because the workforce is "unadaptable and untrained. It cannot respond to the opportunities which industry may offer."
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"回答"之意。
means: answer ：常用词，指用书面、口头或行动对他人的请求、询问、质问等作出回答或反应。
reply ：较正式用词，较少用于口语。侧重经过考虑的较正式答复。
respond ：正式用词，指即刻的，以口头或行动对外来的号召、请求或刺激等作出回答或响应。
retort ：指对不同意见、批评或控诉作出迅速、有力的回答，即"反驳"。
return ：正式用词，从本义"归来，回去"引申作"回答、答辨"讲时，含反驳或反唇相讥之意。

stems_affixes.word_buile: despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答

Sentence.sentence: Biologist Kristin says the plan is to see how the birds respond to the multi-colored road this summer.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: By connecting directly with customers, and by responding quickly to changes in the markets as well as in the ecosystems (生态系统), small farmers can keep one step ahead of the big guys.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Participants indicated the degree to which the social role mattered by responding to statements such as "volunteering in hospital is an important part of who I am".
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Respond quickly and briefly, apologizing for your mistake.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Scientists have responded by noting that hungry bears may be congregating聚集 around human settlements, leading to the illusion错觉 that populations are higher than they actually are.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Slow to respond to the change, your body clock is confused.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The report found that youngsters felt their friendships could be at risk if they did not respond to social media posts quickly, and around the clock.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The report said they also faced pressure to respond to messages at all hours of the day—especially at secondary school when more youngsters have mobile phones.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The robot doesn't just deliver general answers to questions; it responds based on what it learns about each individual in the household.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: They respond to users more slowly.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: This allows them to respond more appropriately to the user.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: This one stranger responded beautifully to my small crisis, but she actually wasn't the only one.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When shown an attractive face and then words with good or bad associations, people responded to positive words faster after viewing an attractive face.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Another urge or need that these gardens appear to respond to, or to arise from is so intrinsic that we are barely ever conscious of its abiding claims on us.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: It is not yet clear how advertisers will respond.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Are we studying that text and trying to respond in a way that fulfils the requirement of a given course? Reading it simply for pleasure? Skimming it for information? Ways of reading on a train or in bed are likely to differ considerably from reading in a seminar room.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A calm, rule-following child might respond better to a different sort of parenting than, for example, a younger sibling.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: But defining what it means to be a good parent is undoubtedly very tricky, particularly since children respond differently to the same style of parenting.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: In our rapidly changing economy, we more than ever need people in the workplace who can take  initiative and exercise their imagination "to respond to unexpected events".
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Specific brain regions that respond during direct gaze are being explored by other researches, using advanced methods of brain scanning.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Yet humans remain fascinated by the idea of robots that would look, move, and respond like humans, similar to those recently depicted on popular sci-fi TV series such as "Westworld" and "Humans".
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

means.word_mean: 回答; 回应; 作出反应;  响应; 回报

sentences.en: They responded my joke by laughing.
sentences.cn: 他们对我的笑话报以大笑。

sentences.cn: 他们的代表对我方的提议毫无回应的迹象。

expand_knowledge_list.en: 1.How did they respond to the news?
expand_knowledge_list.cn: 他们对这则消息有什么反应？

entry.def: When you respond to something that is done or said, you react to it by doing or saying something yourself.

example.ex: They are likely to respond positively to the President's request for aid...
example.tran: 他们可能会对总统的援助要求作出积极回应。

example.ex: The army responded with gunfire and tear gas...
example.tran: 军队用炮火和催泪瓦斯予以反击。

entry.def: When you respond to a need, crisis, or challenge, you take the necessary or appropriate action.
entry.tran: 应对;作出回应;作出反应

example.ex: This modest group size allows our teachers to respond to the needs of each student.
example.tran: 这样的小组规模适中，可以使老师照顾到每一个学生的需求。

entry.def: If a patient or their injury or illness is responding to treatment, the treatment is working and they are getting better.
entry.tran: 有良好反应;有积极效果

example.ex: I'm pleased to say that he is now doing well and responding to treatment.
example.tran: 我很高兴地说，他现在恢复得不错，治疗取得了积极的效果。

means.word_mean: 1. show a response or a reaction to something

sentences.sentence: "We answered that we would accept the invitation"
"The cancer responded to the aggressive therapy"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the noun senses): from Old French, from respondre 'to answer', from Latin respondere, from re- 'again' + spondere 'to pledge'. The verb dates from the mid 16th cent

sentences.en: Staff respond well to her unbuttoned style of management.

sentences.en: Responded Walton: " I was terrible. "

sentences.en: Salim, annoyed and bewildered that his brother still cares about her, responds she's " long gone. "

sentences.en: And, if that sounded grim, Greene responded almost jauntily. No, not grim, but realistic.

sentences.en: To this request Jesus was able to respond and healed them both immediately.

sentences.en: In the nonlinear system value simulation, it obtained a better step respond.

sentences.cn: U2, REM等国际知名乐手及乐团都纷纷响应了这个活动.
sentences.en: World renown singers and bands, such as Peter Gabriel, U 2 and REM, responded to this activity.

sentences.cn: 第四, 我们积极响应中国政府的号召, 深入中西部地区市场提供服务.
sentences.en: Fourthly, we responded positively to the call of the Chinese Government, the Midwest market.

sentences.cn: appbar应该响应这个通知消息,并发送ABM_QUERYPOS、ABM_SETPOS消息.
sentences.en: An appbar should respond to this notification message by sending ABM _ QUERYPOS and ABM _ SETPOS messages.

sentences.cn: 我要如何响应他的攻击?
sentences.en: A : How should I respond to his attack?

sentences.cn: 服务器随时准备对来自要求服务的客户机做出响应.
sentences.en: The server is ready at any moment to respond to requests from clients asking for service.

sentences.cn: 同样地, 它通常都会以卷标 、 定义 、 意见 、 以及分析来响应周遭的世界.
sentences.en: As such, it usually responds to the world with labels, definitions, opinions, and analysis.

sentences.cn: 喷油器 # 7输出驱动器没有正确地响应控制信号.
sentences.en: Injector # output driver does not respond properly to the control signal.

sentences.cn: 带宽说明了仪器在某一频率范围内响应时变信号的能力.
sentences.en: Bandwidth describes the instrument's ability to respond to time varying signals over a range of frequencies.

sentences.cn: 建立快速有效的团体学习能力, 响应技术变化.
sentences.en: Groups to establish a rapid and effective learning ability, to respond to technological change.

sentences.cn: 或者, 当肿瘤最初响应于治疗但对随后的治疗变得难以治愈时,就会导致获得性耐药性.
sentences.en: Alternatively, acquired resistance results when tumors initially respond to therapy but become refractory to subsequent treatments.

sentences.cn: 没有可用的音频硬件或硬件未响应.
sentences.en: There is no audio hardware available or the hardware is not responding.

sentences.cn: PI控制器使响应的速度更快,超调量更小.
sentences.en: PI controller made the respond speed faster and the overshoot less.

sentences.cn: 像静态控件一样, IME窗口 类自己不响应用户的输入.
sentences.en: Like static controls, IME window does not respond to user input by itself.

sentences.cn: 他们迅速响应了这个呼吁.
sentences.en: They quickly responded to the appeal.

sentences.cn: AI台湾总会也在台湾响应了这个活动,与台湾的许多乐团合作, 于各地举办音乐会.
sentences.en: AI Taiwan also responded by cooperating with Taiwanese bands, holding concerts all over the country.

sentences.cn: 响应MES用户 的支持请求,解决系统应用中的问题.
sentences.en: Respond to MES user request and timely trouble shooting.

sentences.cn: 他们立即响应,团结得像一个人,起来保卫祖国.
sentences.en: They responded at once and rose as one man in defence of their motherland.

sentences.cn: 这经常是由于人体对训练作出反应的不同速度所造成.
sentences.en: This is often due to the different at which the human body responds to training.

sentences.cn: 我们必须迅速就这一紧急状况作出反应.
sentences.en: We must act swiftly to respond to the urgency.

sentences.cn: 新的牙齿还带有完整的神经纤维,该大鼠可对疼痛测试作出反应.
sentences.en: The new tooth also came complete with nerve fibers and the mice responded to pain tests.

sentences.cn: 人们会对激励作出反应.
sentences.en: People Respond to Incentives.

sentences.cn: 换句话说, 黑点和圆圈随机器人臂的活动作出反应.
sentences.en: In other words, the dot and the circle are responding to the robot arm's movements.

sentences.cn: 公众对银行家报酬的愤怒大部分是正当的, 政界人士对此作出反应也是正确的.
sentences.en: Much public anger at bankers'rewards is legitimate, and politicians are right to respond to it.

sentences.cn: 银行家们坚持称,自己一直在作出反应.
sentences.en: Bankers insist they have been responding.

sentences.cn: 对于向他所作的这种温柔的进攻,他既不用言语也不用行动作出反应.
sentences.en: He responded neither by word nor movement to the gentle advances made him.

sentences.cn: 在美国经济中这项任务由根据市场信息作出反应的企业经理们来完成.
sentences.en: In the American economy, managers of enterprises responding to signals from markets perform this function.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 政府文件

sentences.cn: 高级微设备也被迫作出反应, 帮助推低了电脑价格,刺激了需求.
sentences.en: AMD has been forced to respond, helping to drive down computer prices and stimulating demand.

sentences.cn: 所谓“驱力阈值”, 就是指犬察觉并对某一威胁作出反应的快慢.
sentences.en: By drive threshold, we mean how quickly the dog perceives a threat and responds to it.

sentences.cn: 列宁对这次罢工立即作出反应.
sentences.en: Lenin responded at once to the strike.

sentences.cn: 不过,你一旦懂得了那些信号以及如何作出反应,那么, 生活就可以轻松多了.
sentences.en: Once you've learned the signals and how to respond, life becomes infinitely easier.

sentences.cn: 容错路由算法的变化作出反应,并在网络中的射频环境.
sentences.en: Fault tolerant routing algorithms respond to changes in the network and in the RF environment.

sentences.cn: 海马体的功能之一是对压力作出反应.
sentences.en: Among other jobs , the hippocampus is involved in responding to stress.

sentences.cn: 我认为亚美尼亚局势非常严峻的消息一旦披露，全世界都将作出反应。
sentences.en: Once the news gets out that Armenia is in a very critical situation, I think the world will respond.

sentences.cn: 你把东西输入进去,它就会作出反应.
sentences.en: You type things in, and it responds.

Sentence.sentence: Either way, we have choices about how we respond to it when it comes.

Sentence.sentence: Dogs may have learned to detect threat signs from humans and respond by trying to make peace, according to researcher Sanni Somppi.

Sentence.sentence: Responding promptly to accidents and other emergencies is important, but it is their smallest job.

Sentence.sentence: That way, you see and hear more: and your mind responds gratefully to the greater amount of wildness in your life.

Sentence.sentence: But it's common politeness to respond to a personal message, preferably within 24 hours of receiving it.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In contrast, they might only respond to a girl's comments with a nod.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
